solution_line_template: The second student counted {first_student_count}/{third_denominator} = {additional_squirrels} more squirrels than the first student.
Together, the first and second student counted {first_student_count}+{second_student_count} = <<{first_student_count}+{second_student_count}={total_squirrels}>>{total_squirrels} squirrels combined.
